CustomField.formula: if(VALUE(LEFT(OneCRM__Expiration_Date__c ,2)) <12, DATE( VALUE( RIGHT( OneCRM__Expiration_Date__c ,4)), VALUE(LEFT( OneCRM__Expiration_Date__c ,2)) + 1 , 1) -1, DATE( VALUE( RIGHT( OneCRM__Expiration_Date__c ,4))+1, 1 , 1) -1 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date after which we can no longer use this credit card.
CustomField.label: Expiration Date (Date)
